text.0: vāyu the bright is offered thee best of the meath at holy rites.
text.1: come thou to drink the soma juice god longedfor on thy teamdrawn car.
text.2: o vāyu thou and indra are meet drinkers of these somadraughts.
text.3: for unto you the drops proceed as waters gather to the vale.
text.4: o indravāyu mighty twain speeding together lords of strength.
text.5: come to our succour with your team that ye may drink the soma juice.
text.6: the longedfor teams which ye possess o heroes for the worshipper.
text.7: turn to us indravāyu ye to whom the sacrifice is paid.
